alert.note: Alert for Catano; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 30 at 9:32PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Catano and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 100 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 932 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
